name: Windows Vault Schema File
summary: Learn about .VSCH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VSCH files are typically located in the following directory:
Windows Vault may also create two other files with the .VPOL and .VCRD extensions when creating a user vault.
NOTE: You can access your Windows Vault through the Credential Manager by opening the Control Panel, choosing User Accounts and Family Safety, and selecting Credential Manager.

description: File created by Windows Vault (also called the Credential Manager), a program available with Windows 7 that allows users to securely store personal information such as user names and passwords; contains a schema, or data description, for the data stored in the vault.
